attributes.action: prosecute all mps who have made fraudulent claims for expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many mps have made claims for expenses for items they are not entitled to. They have been paid and are therefore in receipt of money they are not entitled to. They should be prosecuted.

rejection.details: The Government does not have the power to prosecute. This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
